title: The University years
creator_credit: Raymond Hancock and South Africa. Ministry of Information
brief_description: Illustrates the complexity of higher educational organisations and at the same time the wide range of facilities offered in a multi-national country such as South Africa. We see Rand, Port Elizabeth and Rhodes Universities: teaching situations, the study of electricity, teaching deaf children and veterinary studies.
